description: Global skills and commands repository for Claude, Codex, and Cursor AI agents
name: agentic-indie-dev-library

scripts.check-symlinks: bash -c 'for link in ~/.claude/skills ~/.codex/skills ~/.cursor/commands ~/.cursor/skills; do if [[ -L "$link" ]]; then echo "✓ $link -> $(readlink "$link")"; else echo "✗ $link (not a symlink)"; fi; done'
scripts.count: bash -c 'echo "Claude skills: $(ls -1 agents/.claude/skills 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d " ")"; echo "Codex skills: $(ls -1 agents/.codex/skills 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d " ")"; echo "Cursor commands: $(ls -1 agents/.cursor/commands 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d " ")"; echo "Cursor skills: $(ls -1 agents/.cursor/skills 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d " ")"'
scripts.lint:sh: bash -c 'if command -v shellcheck >/dev/null 2>&1; then find scripts -name "*.sh" -exec shellcheck {} +; else echo "⚠ shellcheck not installed, skipping shell script linting"; fi'
scripts.prepare:deploy: bun run lint:fix && bun run validate && bun run check-symlinks
